short_summary: The Canada Revenue Agency requires the supply and delivery of seventeen (17) new exterior drop boxes for the use of taxpayers to drop off mail. The required CRA locations where the drop boxes are to be supplied and delivered are listed in the solicitation documents.
description: The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) requires the supply and delivery of seventeen (17) new exterior drop boxes for the use of taxpayers to drop off mail, as further described at Annex A: Statement of Work. Please refer to the solicitation documents for further information and instructions regarding this opportunity.
